mapper.select: SELECT worker.*, type.name TYPE,CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM worker ,workertype TYPE, district d1, district d2 WHERE worker.id = #{id} AND worker.typeValue = type.id AND d1.id = worker.cityId AND d1.pid = d2.id

SELECT worker.*, type.name TYPE, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM worker ,workertype TYPE, district d1, district d2 WHERE worker.typeValue = type.id AND d1.id = worker.cityId AND d1.pid = d2.id
select worker.*, type.name type from worker ,workertype type where 1=1 and (typeValue like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{type},'%')) or #{type}='') and worker.typeValue = type.id
select worker.*, type.name type from worker ,workertype type where (name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) or #{name}='') and worker.typeValue = type.id

SELECT worker.*, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM worker, house, district d1, district d2 WHERE houseId=#{houseId} AND FIND_IN_SET(worker.id, workerIds) AND d1.id = worker.cityId AND d1.pid = d2.id
